an5.113:1.1: “Mendicants, a mendicant who has five qualities can’t enter and remain in right immersion.
an5.113:1.3: It’s when a mendicant can’t endure sights, sounds, smells, tastes, and touches.
an5.113:1.4: A mendicant who has these five qualities can’t enter and remain in right immersion.
an5.113:2.1: A mendicant who has five qualities can enter and remain in right immersion.
an5.113:2.3: It’s when a mendicant can endure sights, sounds, smells, tastes, and touches.
an5.113:2.4: A mendicant who has these five qualities can enter and remain in right immersion.”
